    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationWindow

        public AnimationWindow(AnimatedSimulation animatedSimulation)
        Constructor of the animation window Creates a new stage from the file javafxlayout.fxml. It initializes the simulation diagram and puts it in the scrollpane. Then it sets the cell factory for the sbl and esbl and creates the observable lists in order to display the SBNotices. Then sets the cell factory for the table displaying the breakpoints.
        Parameters:
        animatedSimulation - The simulation to be displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        Method called to display the main window

      • addIcon

        public void addIcon(EntityIcon icon,
                    double defaultX,
                    double defaultY)
        Add an EntityIcon to the simulation diagram
        Parameters:
        icon - the EntityIcon to be added
        defaultX - the default x coordinate for the Icon
        defaultY - the default y coordinate for the Icon

      • removeIcon

        public boolean removeIcon(EntityIcon icon)
        Remove an EntityIcon from the simulation diagram
        Parameters:
        icon - the icon to be removed
        Returns:
        if the remove was successful

      • getVariableDisplay

        public VariableDisplay getVariableDisplay()

      • addBreakpoint

        public static void addBreakpoint(EntityIcon icon,
                                 java.lang.String attribute,
                                 java.lang.String breakpointValue)
        Add a breakpoint the the simulation.
        Parameters:
        icon - The icon for which a breakpoint will be created.
        attribute - The attribute that will trigger the breakpoint.
        breakpointValue - The value that will pause the simulation once the attribute reaches it.
